item.title: Housing costs
item.description: Booming real estate prices Questions Why are prices going up all across the country / continent? How is Vancouver both typical and atypical in this dynamic? Links https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2021/05/deregulate-the-market-for-land.html https://www.policynote.ca/build-non-profit/#.YFDQV5fcRgI.twitter https://www.policyalternatives.ca/publications/reports/planning-build-out-affordable-rental-housing-metro-vancouver https://twitter.com/GRIDSVancouver/status/1399115931511529472?s=19 https://twitter.com/GRIDSVancouver/status/640544192045826049?s=19
